question_text:
Question 11 
 
 A 10 bit D/A converter is calibrated over the full range 0 to 10 V. If the input to the D/A converter is 13A 
(in hex), the output (rounded off to three decimal places) is _______ V. 
Ans. 
2.95 to 3.15 (3.069) 
Sol.
